name: jupyter-nbcelltesting
description: An extension for the Jupyter notebook that tests and compares cell output against specified desired output.

scripts.install-extension: jupyter-nbextension install ./nbcelltesting $PYFLAG && jupyter-nbextension enable nbcelltesting/main $PYFLAG && jupyter-nbextension enable nbcelltesting/resources/diff.min $PYFLAG

author: Daniel Krenn <git@danielkrenn.at>
